Tour of the French Riviera from Monaco to Cannes, 21 April 2003

---Obie sitting and resting out of her wheelchair which couldn't be used on the steep steps---
---Guess who again! Weather was cool, but not cold, and sunny.---
---Cafe where refreshments could be obtained.---

---Looking back at the medieval village, church, and castle ruins---
---Trimmed trees are plane trees which are abundant throughout the area---
---Just an interesting pattern of branches captured against a gorgeous sky! You can see why the impressionists painted in this area.---

---Entering the palace area in Monaco. Monaco is its own country---1 mile square.---
---Statue honoring the Grimaldi family which in 1297 came from Genoa to rule Monaco by capturing the fort held by their rivals. For 700 years the family has ruled with Prince Ranier the current head of state.---
---Crowd gathering for the changing of the guard at Monaco's palace---
